verbs.description: [ARG1: Israel 's military] [V: is] [ARG2: on high alert] [ARGM-CAU: as a result of irregular activity of Iranian forces in Syria just before Trump announced his withdrawal of the Iran deal] .
Israel 's military is on high alert as a result of irregular activity of Iranian forces in Syria just before [ARG0: Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: his withdrawal of the Iran deal] .
